item.title: Apps & Services I currently use
item.description:
Here’s the list of apps/services I used regularly throughout the year:

Apps:

  • 🌐 Web Browser: Firefox
  • ✉️ RSS Client: Akregator
  • ⌨️ Launcher KRunner
  • 🗣️ Chat: Signal & Element (Matrix)
  • 🔩 Code Editor: Kate
  • 🕹️ Game Launcher: Heroic Games Launcher, Bottles (for Fallout TTW), and Steam

Services:

  • 🗒️ Notes: Siyuan Notes
  • 💾 Git: Gitea
  • ☁️ Cloud Storage: Nextcloud
  • 📒 Bookmarks: Linkwarden
  • 🔊 Music: PlexAmp & sometimes Soundcloud and YT Music.
  • 🔐 Passwords Management: Bitwarden (Vaultwarden to be precise)
  • 🔎 Search: SearXNG (i use this instance)

item.title: Tech Independance
item.description:
Why ?

Everyday we let big companies like Google, Meta, X, Reddit, etc, watch and remember parts of our lifes, and often sensitive parts that you shouldn’t share with others.
We trust people that we don’t know, giving them our sensitive data, all of it is on another’s person computer. Hundreds of cases happenned, companies keep getting hacked and critical informations as social security numbers, names, address, etc.. keeps leaking to the public, and it still happening to this day.
